subject: Served in the Military?
body: You may be eligible for up to 50k in GI Bill and Military Tuition Assistance.  Fill out one simple form and get access to: - The Insiders' Guide to GI Bill Benefits - Guide to 300 Million in Military and Veteran scholarships - One-click access to schools awarding credit for Military service - Schoolfinder, our online tool to find military-friendly programs - now with over 4,000 schools  Find Schools that Want You!                                This is an advertisement of potential interest to Servicemembers and Veterans.  To stop future mailings from Miltary.com, please Visit This Link  To unsubby postal mail, send correspondence to: Unsubs c/o Military Advantage 799 Market Street, Suite 700, San Francisco, CA 94103-2045 Requests may take up to 10 business days to process from time of receipt
